title: Did these words originate with Ruth Bader Jensburg?
subtitle: "I'm not asking for a favor for my sex." All I'm asking our brothers to do is take their feet off our necks, read Mimi.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: Ruth Bieder Jensburg was the first to say, "I'm not asking for a favor for my sex." All I ask of our brothers is that they take their feet off our necks.
